tags: pls stop pitting my boys against eachother
summary:
Mineta is awesome, and I love him more than anything, you guys know this. 
But please, stop saying Bakugou is a terrible person...
body:
Mineta is awesome, and I love him more than anything, you guys know this.

But please, stop saying Bakugou is a terrible person to make Mineta seem better by comparison. It’s not helping anything.

Mineta has his problems, Bakugou has his.

But neither one of them are terrible people, and I hope that I can see both, yes both, of them become good heroes one day.

summary: Hi! May I get a male mashup. I’m 5’6” with curly hair.  I like reading and trying new things. I really like doing hair and...
question: Hi! May I get a male mashup. I’m 5’6” with curly hair.  I like reading and trying new things. I really like doing hair and nails. I’m not a girly girl, but I’m not a tomboy either. I’m right in the middle since I don’t mind fighting or getting dirty. I’m also into astrology and spirituality. I’m pretty quiet when I first meet people before I open up. I have been called a perfectionist or an overachiever, but I prefer doing my very best. I’m a pretty straightforward person. I enjoy relaxing
answer:
✎ Mashirao Ojiro

  • mashirao’s the one for you!
  • he likes trying out new things, so whenever you suggest something he’s more than happy to tag along with you! he loves to tick things off of his bucket list, and it just makes it all the more enjoyable when you’re there with him. often he’ll take you on dates where the both of you try out something completely new and it’s definitely a great bonding experience - the two of you have a tonne of fun doing it too!
  • he actually loves to read too, so he’s more than happy to just sit with you at home with you in his arms as the both of you read together. it’s a great way to relax and he loves just being able to chill and enjoy your presence. it’s definitely one of his favourite things to do and his go to date if his original plan doesn’t work out due to bad weather or something else. he really does enjoy being with you, and he always feels like he can unwind and enjoy himself.
  • he’ll definitely help you with painting your nails if you need help. at first he’d do it really badly, but after a while he’s actually gets really good and will do it whenever you ask him to.
  • he isn’t bothered about whether you’re a girly girl or a tomboy, he just wants you to be you and is happy with who you are. he likes that you don’t mind getting dirty or fighting, because he knows that way that you can defend yourself in the situation ever arises where you’re attacked and he isn’t there to defend you. but he still worries about you of course, though he feels slightly better whenever you kick someone’s ass in a fight.
  • mashirao doesn’t know about astrology and spiritual things, so he’s always interested to hear you talk about it. he gets a little freaked out when he realises how accurate it is and how you can tell so much about a person based on star signs and other things, but otherwise he’s actually really interested in it! he’ll listen to you willingly whenever you talk about it and probably even ask you to do readings for him from time to time. he’s amazed that you know so much about it.
  • he doesn’t mind that you’re quiet at first, and he won’t force you into talking to him. he’ll let you take your time warming up to him and will be more than happy to talk to you when you finally warm up to him!
  • he admires the fact that you try your best and he’s incredibly proud of you for doing so. he’s always there to support you and encourage you to try your best, and he doesn’t mind the fact that you’re an overachiever. he just wants to make sure that you’re doing the best you can so you can have a comfortable life, and he’ll always make sure that you never overwork yourself

written on 03/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!

tags: I don't know what other tags to add
summary: Hero Academia Roleplay
title: Hero Academia Roleplay
body:
Hello.

A couple of people and I are starting up a Hero Academia roleplay server on Discord. It’s set a few years after the anime in the UK, and is OC based, but we do accept canon characters.

We like literate roleplay, and everyone is welcome to join. It’s all very chill, so don’t be afraid to ask for information!

If you are interested in joining, or want more information, feel free to message me!

reblog.comment:

If you are interested in joining, or want more information, feel free to message me!

summary: Random Adorable Warmup
title: Random Adorable Warmup
body:
I wrote this a while ago and I may have posted it??? But I can’t find it. So if it’s already been read, sorry! But if it hasn’t, uh, have some dadmight fluff!

Toshinori wasn’t entirely certain how he’d found himself in this position - well, no, that wasn’t true, he knew *exactly* how he’d gotten here. Inko insisted it was daddy’s turn almost the moment he’d walked through the door. Izuku’s eyes had lit up in excitement and Toshinori couldn’t say *no*. Not to that face.

And so All Might was sitting here, feeling slightly puzzled. His hands were behind him - not restrained, but clasped there as if he couldn’t use them. A blanket was draped across his shoulders.Inko was on the far side of the room, currently giving him a look, which Toshi recognized as the part where he was supposed to plaintively call out to Izuku.

He tried to ignore the fact that Inko was recording this little game.  “Could you run me through this one more time…?” Toshi repeated the question, watching his wife’s expression.

Inko laughed, and her smile could have lit up the room all by itself. “You know everything you need to, I promise.” She insisted, not for the first time. “Just call out to him.”

Toshinori resigned himself to not getting an answer until he saw what Izuku was going to do

“Somebody help!” Toshi was careful not to let his voice get too loud, like it might when he was actively doing hero work, but it certainly carried far enough for the boy to overhear him. Somewhere beyond the half-closed door, the pro could hear his son’s delighted giggles.

The giggles grew louder as the boy came charging into the room. “I am here!” Just as the door burst all the way open, and then “I gonna save you!”

Toshinori thought his heart was going to burst. And as Izuku pulled the blanket off and ‘freed’ his hands, Toshinori turned and pulled the small boy - who was wearing a onesie designed after his own costume, he realized - into a tight embrace.

The hero made no move to acknowledge the fact that there were tears threading down his cheeks, and just held the small boy closer, though he was careful not to actually hurt him.

After a moment or so - though it felt much, much longer - Toshi leaned back a bit after loosening his grip on the boy who had begun squirming to be freed, smiling faintly.

“I saved you daddy!”

Toshinori smiled at him again, and nodded. “So you did.”

He tried to ignore the fact that Inko was recording this little game.  “Could you run me through this one more time…?” Toshi repeated the question, watching his wife’s expression.

Inko laughed, and her smile could have lit up the room all by itself. “You know everything you need to, I promise.” She insisted, not for the first time. “Just call out to him.”

Toshinori resigned himself to not getting an answer until he saw what Izuku was going to do

“Somebody help!” Toshi was careful not to let his voice get too loud, like it might when he was actively doing hero work, but it certainly carried far enough for the boy to overhear him. Somewhere beyond the half-closed door, the pro could hear his son’s delighted giggles.

The giggles grew louder as the boy came charging into the room. “I am here!” Just as the door burst all the way open, and then “I gonna save you!”

Toshinori thought his heart was going to burst. And as Izuku pulled the blanket off and ‘freed’ his hands, Toshinori turned and pulled the small boy - who was wearing a onesie designed after his own costume, he realized - into a tight embrace.

The hero made no move to acknowledge the fact that there were tears threading down his cheeks, and just held the small boy closer, though he was careful not to actually hurt him.

After a moment or so - though it felt much, much longer - Toshi leaned back a bit after loosening his grip on the boy who had begun squirming to be freed, smiling faintly.

“I saved you daddy!”

Toshinori smiled at him again, and nodded. “So you did.”
trail.content_abstract: I wrote this a while ago and I may have posted it??? But I can’t find it. So if it’s already been read, sorry! But if it hasn’t, uh, have some dadmight fluff!

tags: at some point I should go through all my posts and make sure my tags are reasonably sensible
summary: burden to bear snippet
title: burden to bear snippet
body: [Izuku] wasn’t sure how long he struggled against the villain where he lay before the quiet realization that he couldn’t win this set in. The realization that he had failed and he’d never graduate and he’d never really be a hero. Mom….dad… I’m sorry.

summary: A Typical Day
body:
A Typical Day

Bakugo just wants to relax…

————-

“WHY ARE YOU NERDS FOLLOWING ME?! GET LOST!” It sounded like…

BOOM!

She covered her ears. It definitely was her boyfriend.

She didn’t bother to turn around, when her dorm room door opened and slammed shut, or when her bed desperately heaved from him jumping face first into the covers. Only when Katsuki released a frustrated sigh did she acknowledge him.

“Hard day?” Her fingers tangled into his unruly hair, massaging his scalp.

“Just idiots, all of them are so stupid!” He seethed, “and Deku…” She rolled her eyes, those two sure had obsessions over each other. She thought over the last couple years, his anger and temper would quell. Improved significantly, yes, but completely change temperament, no.

“Relax Katsuki. It’s not worth getting worked up over.”

“ARE YOU TELLING ME WHAT TO DO?” Oh, she poked the bear…well looking at his manic eyes… she had poked Lord Explosion Murder. She could swear his entire face was flexing in anger. She tried not to snort, thinking about his unapproved hero names.

“Perhaps..” she shrugged, knowing it would it utterly piss him off, if he wasn’t already.

In a matter of seconds, he had her pinned beneath him. Hand on her throat, she nearly purred on contact. “You’re such a freak.”

She winked, grinning like a flirty fool. “And you like it.”

summary: Hi I'm new to your blog and I read a few of the match ups you've done and I like them! I was wondering if I could get a male...
question: Hi I'm new to your blog and I read a few of the match ups you've done and I like them! I was wondering if I could get a male match up? I'm 5"1,I have long colored blue hair,thick thighs,Hazel eyes,and a birth mark that looks like a butterfly on sorta roud cheeks! I'm an anxious ball of a person,I tend to zone out into my daydreams or a book,get me talking about something I enjoy and I won't shut up will steal clothing of someone I'm comfy with I cry a lot and I'm /extremely/sassy and swear a ton
answer:
thank you sweetheart! sorry its a little short - you didn’t leaves any likes/dislikes/hobbies - but if you want me to add more remind me who you are and i’ll do so!

✎ Katsuki Bakugou

  • katsuki’s the one for you!
  • he isn’t the most gentle of people, but he’s really gentle with you. he knows that you’re an anxious person, so will make an extra effort to keep his cool around you so that he doesn’t make you even more anxious. he actually tries his best to help you cope with being so anxious and probably asked you for ways he can help you whenever you’re feeling particularly uneasy. definitely hella reassuring and will stay by your side if that’s what you want him to do, and he’ll always triple check that you’re ok before leaving you.
  • he low key gets annoyed at first when you start day dreaming around him, but eventually he gets used to it. he loves the dreamy expression on your face and honestly he could stare at you for hours because you just look so perfect. usually after you pull yourself out of your dream-like state he’ll sit and listen to you talk about what you were thinking about, and he especially loves hearing about them when it involves him.
  • he loves to just hold you whenever you read books and snuggle with you. he doesn’t mind that you’re completely zoned out from him, he just enjoys your presence and being with you and honestly he couldn’t ask for anything more. it really helps him to calm down and relax after a tense day, and sometimes he’ll fall asleep just listening to your soft breathing as you concentrate on your book.
  • katsuki will definitely take every opportunity he can to talk to you about things you love. he loves the way your eyes light up and sparkle with excitement, and he would happily listen to your voice all day every day. your voice is definitely his favourite sound, so he doesn’t mind if you won’t shut up about the thing you’re talking about, even if it is something he’s really uninterested in. you’re the only person he won’t tell to shut up.
  • wear his clothes and katsuki will just completely fall head over heels for you. he loves seeing you in his jumpers and t-shirts and doesn’t mind you taking them if you’re going to wear them. he thinks its the cutest thing ever and he loves it a hell of a lot. at least once a month he’ll go to your house and retrieve all of his shirts and hoodies because he’s run out and then slowly they’ll filter their way back into your bedroom.
  • it upsets katsuki a lot when you cry, so he’ll hold you and whisper soothing words to you. he’ll dry your tears with his thumbs and press kisses all over you face. he’ll give you advice and just be there to support you until you feel better. whatever you want or need he’ll get for you and he’ll try his best to cheer you up. he isn’t the best with words but he’ll dry his damn hardest for you.
  • he absolutely adores you sass. he loves it when you’re sassy to people and put them in their place and he always brags about it to everyone. he’s glad that you can stand up for yourself and is incredibly proud of you whenever yo do. he always feels immensely satisfied whenever you put someone in their place. he loves the fact that you swear a ton too - he doesn’t think he could have handled it if you didn’t like swearing - and he finds it incredibly attractive whenever you do swear.
  • definitely calls you round cheeks, and love tracing your birthmark with his fingers - he’d never say it out loud but he thinks its the cutest thing ever. katsuki is also a huge thigh man, and if you ever feel self conscious about them then he’ll always tell you just how beautiful you are.

written 03/05/19. requests: open. match ups: open.

PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE MATCH-UPS ARE JUST FOR FUN AND IF YOU DON’T LIKE THEM I’M SORRY! I TRY MY BEST AND PICK SOMEONE BASED ON WHAT I THINK AND IF YOU DON’T AGREE THAT’S FINE BUT NO HATE PLS <3 I TRY MY BEST!
